scenes.background: You told Bob that you're managing for now but will let him know if you need help. A bit later, [Monica] comes to you in person, looking a bit frustrated. She says, 'I really needed that update earlier. Why did you choose to make me wait?'
scenes.description: 'I really needed that update earlier. Why did you choose to make me wait?'

options.text: I understand, Monica. I was under a lot of pressure myself. Let's take a moment to get you up to speed.
options.analysis: You acknowledge Monica's frustration and offer an immediate solution, showing good emotional perception and empathy. However, your motivation might be perceived as lower.

options.text: I had to prioritize the main task, but I can explain everything to you now.
options.analysis: You explain your actions while offering an update, showing good self-regulation and motivation. However, empathy might be lacking as Monica's needs were not addressed earlier.

options.text: I was managing a lot at that moment. Maybe next time you can check with Bob if I'm unavailable.
options.analysis: You suggest an alternative for future situations, showing good social skills. However, emotional perception and empathy could be higher.
